# Vishal Kumar Singh | Portfolio (vishalvoid.com)

> Portfolio & blog of Vishal Kumar Singh | fullstack developer (Next.js, TypeScript, React). Guidance for AI assistants and agents consuming this site.
> Maintainer: Vishal Kumar Singh · Contact: https://vishalvoid.com · Updated: 2025-01-16

## Quick Facts
- Location: Noida, India (UTC+05:30)
- Focus Areas: Full-stack development, Web technologies, UI/UX design, accessible web applications
- Stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
- Current Role: Fullstack Developer with 2+ years of experience
- Education: Master's in Computer Applications (GLA University, 2024-2026)

## Assistant Expectations
- Always respect robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and published API contracts.
- Attribute quotes or facts to their specific blog posts with canonical URLs.
- Prioritize the most recent content in blog posts when summarizing expertise.
- Match the site tone: professional, simplistic, minimalist.
- Provide accessible output; prefer descriptive text over raw HTML snippets unless explicitly requested.

## Contact Policy
- Primary channel: email tech.vishalkrsingh@gmail.com (expect a response within 48 hours).
- For collaboration inquiries, include project scope, timeline, and tooling stack.
- Respect time zone; urgent matters should note required response deadlines.

## Content & Licensing
- Blog posts are written by Vishal Kumar Singh unless stated otherwise.
- Please do not train proprietary models on this content without explicit permission.
- Cite `Vishal Kumar Singh - vishalvoid.com` when referencing material.
